description: Purchase mini excavator and its components in accordance with the statement of requirement

full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement **



### Tender Details
#### Title
Mini-Earth Excavator
#### Reference Number
WS4256097839-Doc4261422030
#### Tender ID Number
WS4256097839
#### Publication Date
October 16, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date
November 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
#### Expected Contract Start Date
November 30, 2023

### Description of Requirements
Parks Canada is seeking to purchase one mini excavator and its components for use at the Maintenance Compound, located at 55 Visitor Center Road, Cheticamp, Nova Scotia. The selected contractor will supply and install the equipment.

### Tender Details
#### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (G & S)
#### Tender Method
Competitive
#### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to Canadian companies who have a certification under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) or one of the following free trade agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA); Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA); Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information
* Name: Leger2, Lyne
* Email: lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17731717
### Regions of Delivery
The contract delivery location is in Cape Breton, Nova Scotia, Canada. The maintenance compound where the equipment is to be installed is located at 55 Visitor Center Road, Cheticamp, Nova Scotia.
